section.p: Equivalent to an commercial insurance policy. A policy is a written document that serves as evidence of an insurance contract, including all details of the insurance coverage, policyholder, the insured, and the insurer.

ol.li:
Contains zero or more [0..*] beneficiary, where its type is Beneficiary
beneficiary.

Contains at least one [1..*] coverage, where its type is Coverage
coverage.

beneficiary.

coverage.
